definitions.definition: A rough outline of a topic or situation.
examples: Could you give me the rundown on the new rules?

definitions.definition: A summary of the horses to be raced on a particular day, with their weights , jockeys , odds , etc.
A defensive play in which the runner is caught between two fielders, who steadily converge to tag the runner out.
examples: Smith is caught in a rundown , but Jones will come around to score.

definitions.definition: A Caribbean stew of meat or fish (typically mackerel ) with reduced coconut milk , yam , tomato , onion and seasonings .
A reduction, e.g. of an activity, or in the size of something, such as a fleet.

main_definition: ( chiefly with definite article "the" ) A rough outline of a topic or situation.
secondary_definitions: ( gambling ) A summary of the horses to be raced on a particular day, with their weights , jockeys , odds , etc.
( baseball ) A defensive play in which the runner is caught between two fielders, who steadily converge to tag the runner out.
A Caribbean stew of meat or fish (typically mackerel ) with reduced coconut milk , yam , tomato , onion and seasonings .
A reduction, e.g. of an activity, or in the size of something, such as a fleet.
